name: Paintly Funny
description:
Relax with this fun anime coloring game - Paintly Funny. Just color by the numbers and you'll create beautiful drawings!

Tons of images including anime and manga characters, fashion, flowers, mandalas, unicorns, animals and more.

Each picture is marked with a number and the user just has to fill in the color according to the predefined number to get the perfect job done.

Many new anime images are updated daily. You can share your creations with your friends SHARE.

Easy to play! Please do not be offended if you are not good at painting. Each image has a light blue or grey line indicating the area to be painted and each area has a number and the corresponding number of the paint to be used. Just follow the numbers, coloring has never been easier!

Rediscover the joy and relaxation of comic book paint together anytime, anywhere.

Features
A wide range of anime themes and image categories!
Makes it easy to refresh your coloring game with ease!
Enjoy an exciting and unique color experience and eliminate stress!
Explore amazing daily pictures, happy colors and get happy!

Paintly Funny is the best way to reduce stress! Discover tons of free coloring pages immediately to create your own artwork. Relax and have fun coloring!

Download now!
